description: The node this Taint is attached to has the "effect" on any pod that does not tolerate the Taint.

key.description: Required. The taint key to be applied to a node.

timeAdded.description: Time is a wrapper around time.Time which supports correct marshaling to YAML and JSON.  Wrappers are provided for many of the factory methods that the time package offers.

effect.description: Required. The effect of the taint on pods that do not tolerate the taint. Valid effects are NoSchedule, PreferNoSchedule and NoExecute.

value.description: Required. The taint value corresponding to the taint key.
